name: @lumigo/opentelemetry

1.0.0.name: @lumigo/opentelemetry
1.0.0.description: Lumigo wrapper to trace distributed architecture

scripts.build: rm -rf dist wrapper.tgz && tsc --build --force && tracer="$(npm pack)" && mv "$tracer" wrapper.tgz
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run prettier:fix && npm run lint && npm run test:unit && npm run test:component:express
scripts.test:component:express: npm run build && npm run install-component && jest -c jest.express.component.config.js --detectOpenHandles --runInBand --forceExit

1.1.0.name: @lumigo/opentelemetry
1.1.0.description: Lumigo wrapper to trace distributed architecture

scripts.build: rm -rf dist wrapper.tgz && tsc --build --force && tracer="$(npm pack)" && mv "$tracer" wrapper.tgz
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run prettier:fix && npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.test:unit: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS=--unhandled-rejections=warn jest -c jest.unit.config.js --detectOpenHandles --runInBand --forceExit --silent
scripts.test:components: npm run build && npm run install-component && jest -c jest.component.config.js --detectOpenHandles --runInBand --forceExit

scripts.test:components: npm run build && npm run install-component && jest -c jest.component.config.js --detectOpenHandles --runInBand --forceExit

1.1.3.name: @lumigo/opentelemetry
1.1.3.description: Lumigo wrapper to trace distributed architecture

scripts.build: rm -rf dist wrapper.tgz && tsc --build --force && tracer="$(npm pack)" && mv "$tracer" wrapper.tgz
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run prettier:fix && npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.test:unit: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS=--unhandled-rejections=warn jest -c jest.unit.config.js --detectOpenHandles --runInBand --forceExit --silent
scripts.test:components: npm run build && npm run install-component && jest -c jest.component.config.js --detectOpenHandles --runInBand --forceExit
